game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom and return it to its rightful owner.
game.description: Lady Whimsy's favorite brooch has gone missing, and she needs someone brave and skilled to retrieve it. The thief is rumored to be hiding in the abandoned mine on the outskirts of town.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting +10 strength, and Lady Whimsy's eternal gratitude
game.quest_giver: Lady Whimsy, the wealthy patron of the town

tasks.objective: Gather information about the thief's whereabouts
tasks.description: Speak to the locals and gather any useful information that might lead you to the thief.
Make your way into the abandoned mine, avoiding traps and guards. Find the room where the thief is hiding and retrieve the stolen brooch.

tasks.objective: Return the brooch to Lady Whimsy
tasks.description: Once you have retrieved the brooch, make your way back to Lady Whimsy's estate and return it to her.
